message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm asking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns.  While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go.
